entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
